byline.contributor: Salman Masood contributed reporting from Islamabad, Pakistan.

headline.main: Pakistan Passenger Plane Crashes With 48 on Board

snippet: At least 40 bodies have been recovered from the Pakistani International Airlines crash. Junaid Jamshed, a famous former pop singer, was among those on board....
lead_paragraph: At least 40 bodies have been recovered from the Pakistani International Airlines crash. Junaid Jamshed, a famous former pop singer, was among those on board.
